subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: José Acasuso upset Lleyton Hewitt in a rain-delayed singles match and Argentina won its doubles match against Australia, 3-0, and reach its first Davis Cup final in 25 years.
snippet: José Acasuso upset Lleyton Hewitt in a rain-delayed singles match and Argentina won its doubles match against Australia, 3-0, and reach its first Davis Cup final in 25 years.
